channel.title: Clan Wars help
channel.description:
i want to make a clan wars minigame
i have on already but theres a problem with it.. when u die u goto home and lose ur items, there is no retriction as to who can go in (so ppl can just keep coming back in etc)
so can someone give me a fully functional clan wars tut that only 2 clans can be in at a time, and the loseing team lose their items and the winning team get a prize plus it is announced "*Clan Name* Has Won a battle over *clan name*"
plz help =)

item.title: Clan Wars help
item.dc:creator: @chiz chiz
item.description:
@chiz wrote:

Hmm i dont think this is possible you would have to have castle wars id dunnno how to make but search for a cwars ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 29, 2009, 02:35:05 pm[/size][hr]Woaahh, you got a lot of replies :eek:
